title: Vaccines and Your Immune System: Protecting You From Infection
author: Becky Upham
cleaned_text: Vaccines and Your Immune System: Protecting You From Infection We demystify vaccines and how to fortify immunity through diet, supplements, and lifestyle habits. The Immunity 8 Staying hydrated, getting plenty of sleep and regular exercise, eating a balanced diet, and other positive lifestyle habits can all help strengthen your immune system to keep you healthy.
